summary.para: Gets the background color of the timed-text style.

param.name: bgColor
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the background color.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines whether the style of timed text is bold.

param.name: bold
param.para: Type: BOOL*
A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the style of timed text is bold. The variable specifies TRUE if the style is bold; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the color of the timed-text style.

param.name: color
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the color.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the font family of the timed-text style.

param.name: fontFamily
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR*
A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the font family of the style.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the font size of the timed-text style.

param.name: fontSize
param.para: Type: double*
A pointer to a variable that receives the font size of the timed-text style.

param.name: unitType
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text style is measured.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the font style of the timed-text style.

param.name: fontStyle
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the font style.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the name of the timed-text style.

param.name: name
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR*
A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the name of the style.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines whether the right to left writing mode of the timed-text style is enabled.

param.name: rightToLeft
param.para: Type: BOOL*

A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the right to left writing mode is enabled. The variable specifies TRUE if the right to left writing mode is enabled; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines whether the style of timed text always shows the background.

param.name: showBackgroundAlways
param.para: Type: BOOL*

A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the style of timed text always shows the background. The variable specifies TRUE if the background is always shown; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the text alignment of the timed-text style.

param.name: textAlign
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the text alignment.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets how text is decorated for the timed-text style.

param.name: textDecoration
param.para: Type: DWORD*
A pointer to a variable that receives a combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how text is decorated.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the text outline for the timed-text style.

param.name: color
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the color.

param.name: thickness
param.para: Type: double*
A pointer to a variable that receives the thickness.

param.name: blurRadius
param.para: Type: double*
A pointer to a variable that receives the blur radius.

param.name: unitType
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text is measured.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines whether the timed-text style is external.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns whether the timed-text style is external. If TRUE, the timed-text style is external; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Represents the style for timed text.
